message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a deal now before inflation eats away at our potential earnings.
I think a more even split is fairer. I'm willing to give you $40 now, but next round the money will be worth less to you!
Bob, let's be realistic. The clock is ticking and inflation is hurting my potential gains. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome at this point.
